sessions.summary: Year-end review of AI Taskforce progression, Google Site developments, and a celebration of 2025 readiness milestones.

sessions.summary: Deep dive into AI Use Cases, Call Miner team overview, and Touchtone experiments for data-driven readiness.

sessions.summary: Focus on APAC regional customer focus and the launch of our Community & Social Impact initiatives.

sessions.summary: Deep dive into toolkit refreshers, including the comms matrix, templates, and urgent comms reminders.
